## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{odue4onj}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 6889453395526512086078842436325291323377231813372073125053218687786572586377535275380889856319807443480736006985703541207866281946272355597780398355020234
vulnerability: blum integers
hint: Blum integers are products of primes congruent to 3 modulo 4. These integers have unique properties in cryptography.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=8554062478049285959957350183402410576118680132031233376107336516130652482516737644247503797660916982969566245953592928813670192502484143347853596783348009, e=6546749791627342581371024737453412052087973057153070294152499276540465399444711864380405118810149890173003760333416456873580192370197669884933223922769947
